title: MAGA 'Prophets': God Thinks Trump's Conviction Was Rigged - Democratic Underground Forums
text: [Create a free account](/?com=login&create=1)Support DU (and get rid of ads!): [Become a Star Member](/star) [Latest Breaking News](/?com=forum&id=1014) [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [The DU Lounge](/?com=forum&id=1018) [All Forums](/?com=forums) [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311) [Culture Forums](/?com=forum&id=1312) [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313) [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) [Support Forums](/?com=forum&id=1315) [Help & Search](/?com=search) Related: [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [Editorials & Other Articles](/?com=forum&id=1016), [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311), [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313), [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) (3,402 posts) Thu Jun 6, 2024, 03:08 PM 2 hrs ago [Bundbuster](/?com=profile&uid=122552) Far-right Christian seers claim Trump is a martyr and that God will deliver the vengeance MAGAdonians seek https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-features/trump-conviction-maga-prophets-1235033898/ A trio of prominent, far-right Christians who purport to channel the word of God as it pertains to American politics are pointing to Trumps guilty verdicts as a divine head-fake. The woe that has presently befallen Trump, they prophesy, will boomerang against his enemies, who will suffer defeat as Trump steps again into the power God has ordained for him. Julie Green is an internet preacher from Iowa who hands out biblical prophecy as if it were a daily horoscope. In a prophetic word filmed shortly after Trumps conviction, Green delivered a message she claimed was sent down from the most high. Woe to the enemies of Almighty God. You are laughing, thinking you got what you desired, Green said, voicing her version of the Christian deity. I will tell you I will have the last laugh. Your verdict is a joke. And an illusion I will show you whose verdict really counts. My son is not guilty, Green claimed God said of Trump. And the world will see your kangaroo courts, and how they are a joke, and how they are nothing against Me. Casting Trump in the mold of a biblical king, Green continued, I say, you do not have my David where you want him. But I have you where I want you. I told you you will reap what you have sown Your show is about to end, and my children are about to laugh. God said there would be a boomerang, Kunneman said on a show filmed shortly after the Trump verdict was handed down. In other words, those who would seek for indictments, they themselves would be indicted. Kunneman then asserted that Trumps conviction is also set for reversal. God said, you will see things flop. It will look like it is absolutely over. And then it will flop and then flip. And it will turn in the way of the favor of God. [5 newestHighlight 5 most recent replies](#!) ["God" knows it is "justified" ](#post1)Lovie777 2 hrs ago #1 [If It Was Rigged...](#post2)ProfessorGAC 2 hrs ago #2 [Ms. Green is playing with fire](#post3)durablend 2 hrs ago #3 [Consider the source.](#post4)SarahD 1 hr ago #4 [Also, He's God](#post9)RobinA 1 hr ago #9 [I just got an update from God..](#post5)Permanut 1 hr ago #5 [Huh, their thoughts and prays for convicted felon trump to be found not guilty were not answered.](#post6)republianmushroom 1 hr ago #6 [American religion has the absolute worst fans.](#post7)Initech 1 hr ago #7 [Back in the bad old days, talking to god meant you were religious](#post8)Warpy 1 hr ago #8 [To that, I say to them...](#post10)TSExile 1 hr ago #10 [Is God going to ask for a cut of the dough his "son" is raking in as the assigned martyr?](#post11)Ping Tung 1 hr ago #11 [Eff them](#post12)malaise 1 hr ago #12 [Blasphemers all](#post13)Bundbuster 53 min ago #13 [I just hate it when Jebuses dad only speaks to one moron.](#post14)marble falls 32 min ago #14 (12,647 posts) [Lovie777](/?com=profile&uid=361996) and God truly knows the "Truth". Amen. (65,926 posts) [ProfessorGAC](/?com=profile&uid=104893) ...God would know. Who do you think rigged it? It was rigged in the interest of JUSTICE. (7,514 posts) [durablend](/?com=profile&uid=151753) Don't be surprised if her house is in the path of a tornado. (1,520 posts) [SarahD](/?com=profile&uid=371252) God is a well known paranoid, instructing His followers to kill anyone who disagrees with Him. He was the Josef Stalin of 4,000 years ago. (9,950 posts) [RobinA](/?com=profile&uid=113352) [SarahD (Reply #4)](#post4) shouldn't he have control over the verdict? I mean, if he can't even manage a Manhattan jury I'm not too impressed. And if he can handle a jury, well, I guess he did. (5,840 posts) [Permanut](/?com=profile&uid=221025) "I rebuke the foul demons that have possessed these false prophets, and I smiteth them and cast them out in the name of Me". (14,461 posts) [republianmushroom](/?com=profile&uid=366376) Maybe their God believes the guilty verdict is correct. (100,308 posts) [Initech](/?com=profile&uid=167489) (111,682 posts) [Warpy](/?com=profile&uid=113240) but when god started talking back to you, it was time for the loony bin. Mad Margie is past due for a vacation. (2,967 posts) [TSExile](/?com=profile&uid=369959) "Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap." - Galatians 6: 7 (904 posts) [Ping Tung](/?com=profile&uid=372036) Will God be called as a witness in one of Don's next trials? If so, will he take the Fifth? Sign an NDA pre-trial? (270,170 posts) [malaise](/?com=profile&uid=154965) That is all
